channel.title: Getting Banned?
channel.description:
ok, if i get banned on a lvl 3 i use for scripting,
will it ban my other accounts? do they ban all the accounts that have been used alot from your ip?

item.title: Getting Banned?
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:6, topic:81187”][quote author=dudeofthed link=topic=119306.msg1176479#msg1176479 date=1176911648]

This has been asked countless times. If you use Unsigned Java you have less of a chance of a chain ban.

What’s unsigned Java.

On the detail select screen(runescape), scroll down to the dropdown box and select “Unsigned java using the default java” or something like that.

Oh, thanks for that.
I will do this more often now.
[/quote]

Just be warned, NOTHING is saved permanently on your PC like it is with signed java, so there will be a LOT of loading screens.[/quote]
Well it was loading a lot when i just played it again for a few months. First i will load Signed JAVA. And wait for everything to save then load unsigned java.

Thanks for the warning The Un-Named.

Read full topic

On the detail select screen(runescape), scroll down to the dropdown box and select “Unsigned java using the default java” or something like that.
[/quote]

Oh, thanks for that.
I will do this more often now.[/quote]

Just be warned, NOTHING is saved permanently on your PC like it is with signed java, so there will be a LOT of loading screens.
